attributes.action: PROMOTE AN INDEPENDENT KURDISH STATE IN THE NORTH OF IRAQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT MAY BE SIMPLISTIC BUT COULD WE NOT URGE KURDISH GROUPS IN N.IRAQ TO COMBINE INTO A KURDISH STATE &, WITH THE WESTS ASSISTANCE, PRODUCE A MODEL STATE TO SHOW THE IRAQIS WHAT AN END TO WAR COULD BRING.THE KURDISH REGIONS HAVE OIL,AIRPORTS AND A YEARNING TO BE INDEPENDENT.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
